column3:
More than singing! More than dancing!
I love Pokémon! So, shall we battle?
I’ll let you join my fan club if you can beat me!
Aww, that’s heartbreaking... I’m an idol, too...

Well, that’s me and my Pokémon! Thank you for
{pageend:being such a fan!}
Just so you know, our latest single is called
“Jigglin’ Pokémon Wub”!
I’m working on a story. Can you battle me?
Join me for a live report!
Press coverage denied... But you’re so intriguing!
Interviews are about taking the initiative.

I’ve spotted a charismatic Trainer! Is it OK to go
for the scoop?

As a professional cameraman, I always go for the
best shot!

That’s a downer... I thought I’d found a Trainer
and Pokémon who’d shine on camera.

The lively expressions on you and your
Pokémon’s faces make for some great TV!

Are we all ready to have some fun? I sure am!
Aren’t you having fun? Let’s make it fun! OK?!

OK, how shall we do this? Shall we try
something fantastical?

Oh, how shall I say this? It makes me all lonely,
I say...

A clown’s makeup is a face that’s crying while
laughing. It defines what we do!

Two Pokémon! If you had two Pokémon, we’d get
a great shot here.
Oh! You’re ready for a battle with us?
You’re live on camera, but try to act natural, OK?

OK, that’s how it is, huh. Can’t do anything
about that.

I’d like to take that footage and have it
broadcast worldwide.

Oh, no. What we really want to see is you in
action with two Pokémon!

*giggle*
Will you have a battle with us?
We’ll thoroughly check you out as a Trainer!

Oh, too bad! I wanted to check out
your Pokémon!

I lost, but I’m totally thrilled! We made a
wonderful spectacle!
Pi-Pikachu!
Pikachu!

I need to get more into the character of
a Pokémon...

Come on, time to show off our Pokémon!
Let’s do battle, kiddo!

Your spirit’s giving off some seriously cool vibes...
I can tell that you totally rock!

Now, that is seriously uncool. You have to let
your passion burn!

Rock is about your spirit! Battling is about spirit,
too! That’s what makes a battle rock!

Battling is the best way to learn! Can we get a
battle with you?
Go, my Pokémon, go!

Aww! But battling is the best way to learn
about Pokémon!

It’s hard to win if you don’t have some Pokémon
to choose from.

Whew! You’re really good. We’ve been studying
{pageend:every day, but we were no match at all!}
You’d be able to use these Technical Machines
properly. Here you go!

I need to try the things I learned before I
forget them!

Do you think we would have done better if I
used Potions?

We were actually confident that we would do
pretty good. But I’m completely impressed by
{pageend:how tough you are.}
If you’d like, talk to my friend and get some
Technical Machines from him.

If you want to have a battle with us, you’ll need
to bring more Pokémon.

With someone as beautiful as you for my model,
I am sure to paint a masterpiece!
What is it? Do you wish for a battle?

Though we lost our battle... A toast to your
beauty, which no painting could ever hope
to capture!

He said he’d treat me to a dinner here if I agreed
to model for him. So, I came along, but I haven’t
made up my mind yet.

When I can’t decide, I battle to help make the
decision! How about it?

I’ve decided to model for him. That’s given me
an appetite!

What is it? Are you feeling hungry, too?
Oh, I see. That’s not it—you wanted a battle!
My hors d’oeuvres have gone cold...

I have to slow down on eating these delicious
hors d’oeuvres. I don’t want to be all bloated
by the time the main dish comes.

I’d like a light battle to work up my appetite.
Would you care to join us?

The hors d’oeuvres haven’t grown cold...
These are supposed to be served chilled!

And in Pokémon battles, I also hope to see
beauty. You do agree with me, yes?

The meals prepared here are not merely
healthy—they are also tasty. Diners need not
worry about finding just what they want here.

Today’s main dish is scrumptiously delicious!
If I can keep eating this food, I’ll model anytime!

I feel guilty just eating all this delicious food
like this. I’ll join the battle, too!

The models of great paintings all look very
different. That means I don’t need to worry
about fitting in!

If you want to challenge us, bring some
more Pokémon.

If you want to battle us, you have to have at
least two Pokémon!
Actually, my father happens to be the chef here.

What is it you want, a battle? Bahaha...
You think you can beat us?

We’ve lost, but let’s make a toast to our future
together anyway!

Oh, my! Your father is the chef here?
How wonderful!

I haven’t told him, but my father owns the hotel
{pageend:and restaurant...}
Oh, but that’s beside the point. Would you care
for a battle?
Let’s toast to the prosperity of the restaurant!

I have to hand it to my father—these hors
d’oeuvres are delicious!

Are you asking me for a battle? Well, certainly!
I never back down from a challenge!

Finally. Now we can go about enjoying our meal
without disruption.

Yes! This meal is good enough to serve at
the hotel.

My papa owns this restaurant, but please don’t
{pageend:tell my date—his father works here as a chef.}
I’ll have a battle with you if you keep your
mouth shut.

My date did his best, but you were better than
the both of us.

Heh! My date’s really enjoying Father’s cooking.
She has a dreamy expression after every bite!

I’m feeling great! Sure, I’ll have a battle with you.
That’s why you approached us, right?

My prowess as a Trainer isn’t up to snuff...
It’s not like my father’s scrumptious cooking.

This succulent flavor! It reminds me of a world
trip I took. My papa and I traveled everywhere,
dining at only the best restaurants.

Eating this fabulous meal has really lifted my
spirits. Join us for a battle?

Your father’s cooking has a very magical quality
to it. It seems to perk people up with energy.

If your intention is to test your skill on us,
I daresay you ought to bring at least one
other Pokémon.

Oh, you’re offering to do battle with us?
{pageend:How nice of you.}
Unfortunately, you simply cannot battle us both
with just one Pokémon.

Let me propose a toast to many more happy
years together.

Since I took my retirement, I’ve been traveling
with my wife. We both enjoy searching for
{pageend:delicious dining experiences.}
You seem to enjoy battling with Pokémon.
Am I right?

Well, so much for that. Let’s try to enjoy the rest
of our meal.

To our health, our welfare, and fine
dining! Cheers!

A toast before a meal helps stimulate the
{pageend:appetite, I find.}
But that’s neither here nor there. You wanted a
battle, surely?

Hmm! Now, this is special! It looks like it was just
quickly warmed through, but in reality, much care
has gone into its preparation!

When one gets to be an accomplished gourmet
like myself, one can tell at a glance if a dish is
{pageend:delicious or not.}
You would battle against such discerning taste?

Well, so much for that. We’ll keep a stiff upper
lip and look forward to enjoying the main course.

These hors d’oeuvres are simply divine!
They tell me that I can expect the main
course to be fantastic!

I thought the main course arrived already...
You’re a Trainer seeking battle?
The hors d’oeuvres were most excellent!

Mmm! The chef flambéed this to perfection!
The rich aromas and flavors fill my mouth
with joy!

You’re throwing down a challenge in the middle
of our meal? I would say you’re a very dedicated
Trainer, especially for one so young!

Ah... I’m very satisfied with our meal and
our battle.

Would you like to sample a bite...? Oh, right.
Pokémon battle?

Battling is fine, of course. But personally, I would
rather be out enjoying good meals.

If you want to battle us, you’ll have to bring at
least two Pokémon.

Don’t you have more than one Pokémon?
We’ll have to battle another time!

Alison, um, I, er... Thank you for coming today.
Should we make a toast?

She’s the girl from the Pokémon supply store I go
to all the time. We’re incredibly happy together.
Would you like to battle us?

Oh, gosh. I’m sorry we lost, Alison. You’re not
upset, are you?

Hee hee... Eugene, you act so different from the
way you do at the store. You’re surprisingly shy.

I work at a Pokémon supply store because I
{pageend:love Pokémon.}
My job lets me be with Pokémon all day long,
so it naturally made me pretty decent at battling.
Want to try us?

I don’t worry much about winning or losing.
I keep my Pokémon with me because I love it!

If my Pokémon buddies heard I went on a date
with you, Alison...they’d probably hate me for it.
Are you Alison’s fan, too?

Alison, seeing your smiling face... I can’t tell if
these appetizers are delicious or not!

Sorry, what? A date? Um, Eugene... You are a
valued customer and all, but I just don’t know...

I know I’m being indecisive, but I have to admit—
{pageend:his invitation was just too flattering to refuse.}
I’ll let my Pokémon decide for my fickle heart.
Let’s battle?

You know, it’s true what they say—there is no
evil among Pokémon fans! That goes for you
and Eugene!

Looks like our main course is here. Please enjoy
yourself—I’ve got the bill covered today!
I’ll defeat you and collect the prize money!

Eugene, I think you’re a little awkward,
but you’re very earnest.

If I team up with my date, it might make for an
{pageend:interesting combination.}
I think we could battle in an intriguing manner.
Do you?

The meal was delicious, and our battle was so
much fun. I really insist that we split the bill.

If you had two Pokémon, I’d take you on with
my mom.

What should I have today? Juice, ice cream,
cake, and, and...

Oh, hi, Trainer! Want to battle Pokémon with us
before we have a yummy dinner?

I don’t get it. Grown-ups always have a toast
before eating. But why don’t I see any bread?

My dear, Mommy is so proud of you for doing
{pageend:well on your test.}
You may order anything you like. It’s your
reward, dearest!

Did you know? My boy is not only a genius
at school, but he’s also a Pokémon prodigy!
Would you like to challenge us and see?

I wish to propose a toast. May my darling
Esteban get another 100% on a test!

Wow, they bring out things one dish at a time!
It’s not like how it is at home!

I do my homework while eating, so I can
battle anytime!

We’re going to eat this delicious stuff now.
Bye-bye!

This restaurant is the talk of the town for its
delicious food.

I beg your pardon? You want to battle now?
Well, all right. It’s not as if I dislike battling.

Thank you for letting my dear son experience an
invaluable lesson.

Do mothers and fathers go out to eat like this?
I mean, without taking their kids along.

Well, that’s OK. It’s way more fun for me to
battle than go eat fancy dinners!
Mom, you gotta make me this at home!

This is a special occasion, Esteban. We’re here
to celebrate your great grades!
Oh? A battle, you say? Well, certainly. Why not?
Is the dessert coming soon?

My daughter and I always battle together.
None of that one-on-one nonsense.

I can battle against you with my dad. But first,
please bring more Pokémon.

Here’s a toast for your mother. May she always
be healthy!

My wife’s in the hospital waiting for the baby
to arrive. Since I can’t cook, I came here with
{pageend:my daughter.}
How would you like a battle with us before
we eat?

The house will be a lot noisier when your mother
comes home with the new baby.

I wonder what Mom will bring home—a baby
brother, or a baby sister?

Whether it’s a boy or a girl, I’m going to be their
big sister—so I should get better at Pokémon!
Little babies cry like Pokémon! Piyaaaah!

Wow... Look at these appetizers. This is just
so extravagant.

Let’s get over the sting of that loss by enjoying
this delicious meal!
Wow! This food looks really fancy!

Papa is a rotten cook, so we get to go out and
eat good food like this! Did you come to this
restaurant to battle Pokémon?
I’ve never eaten anything like this before.
Here’s the main dish!
What is it? Did you want to battle with us?

Blythe, I hope the new baby will grow up to be
as kindhearted as you.
I wish Mom were here to eat with us...

My mom gave me my Pokémon. Want to see how
tough they are?

Next time, let’s all come here together—
even the baby!

What’s up? Did you want to be on TV, too?
{pageend:Oh, right, sorry! You wanted to battle!}
You’d be battling the two of us. You need at
least two Pokémon for that.

If you want an autograph, you’ll have to wait till
{pageend:we finish filming.}
Oh, and if you want to battle, bring two
Pokémon, OK?

Let’s start with a shot of the drinks as a
camera test.

Huh? You’re inviting us to battle at a time
like this?
Oh, man... Our drinks are lukewarm now.

Today’s featured drink is freshly squeezed juice
made from ripened Pecha Berries picked
this morning!

Pardon? A Pokémon battle? OK, a quick one
before we do any filming for the show.

Hey, these appetizers sure do look delicious.
Will someone bring me a mist spray so they look
even fresher?

Thanks, that was quick! Wait... Where’s the
{pageend:mist spray?}
Oh, you want a battle? Whatever, then. I’m up
for your challenge!

Photographing food isn’t easy. It’s actually
very technical.

These look fabulous, too. We need the camera
to zoom in more!

Darling Darryl, are you ready? When I take a
bite, I want a close-up of my lips. All right?

Whoa... So this is the main dish? Yowza! Let’s get
this filming done quick so I can chow down, too!

You’ve been sniffing around a lot... Are you
messing with our filming?

Oh, no... Everything’s gone cold while we
were battling.

{pageend:*chomp*}
Mmm... This is...light, and yet rich-flavored...
It delectably melts away... A hint of an aftertaste,
yet crisp... Neither too sweet nor too bitter...
My words can’t do this justice!

It’s not easy trying to describe food while you’re
eating. But I can battle anytime during filming!

I’ll only say this once, so listen closely. I’ll even
say it slowly—to battle against two Trainers,
{pageend:you need two or more Pokémon.}
Now if you were to bring more Pokémon, I could
consider a battle...

Oh, you’ll have to bring more Pokémon than that
to battle us!

And that’s another brilliant day on the markets!
A toast to my Lady Luck!

Since I’ve been with her, I’ve been riding a hot
{pageend:streak on the markets.}
I’m surfing on a wave of good luck! You’re sure
you want to battle us?

This is just a minor setback. I can easily make up
for this!

Ooh! All your stocks went up again? You haven’t
guessed wrong yet!

It’s just one loss. We can make that back with a
big win next time!

There’s no need for technique. You just have to
read what’s in your opponent’s heart.

Now, when I say “heart,” I don’t mean what a
person is thinking. It’s about how they want to
{pageend:be perceived.}
Do you... Would you like me to think of you as a
tough Trainer?
I had a bad feeling about this Trainer...

No, really? Wooow, that is so neat! How can you
tell these things?

My boyfriend could tell that deep down,
{pageend:I’m actually a frightened and lonely child!}
I don’t think I could ever lose with him.
Want to test that theory?
It’s amazing that you predicted you would lose!

Let’s savor this extravagant meal and think of
what it represents. We can use that as motivation
to keep winning at life!

Personally, I think there are two kinds of people:
those who face up to any challenge, and those
{pageend:who duck and cover.}
You’re the type who faces up to any challenge,
am I right?

I’m convinced that he has some extrasensory
{pageend:power or something.}
If I’m teaming up with a guy like that, are you
sure you want to do this?

If it’s not premonition, did you...maybe come
from the future?

One Pokémon is insufficient if you want to battle
against us.

If you’d bring two or more Pokémon, we could
have a battle with you.

Hmm. This beverage’s coloration borders on the
positively toxic... However, my analysis indicates
that it is composed of natural ingredients.
What is it? You are...? Oh, yes, a Trainer.

The results of that battle are insignificant.
Let’s celebrate.
Oh, you’re a Trainer?

Cheers, dear! Please don’t start analyzing what
we just drank!

Interesting. These hors d’oeuvres are fascinating.
Plant fiber 20%, iron 5%, protein 35%.
Curiouser and curiouser...

What is it now? Do you want me to analyze your
skill level?

I feel compelled to analyze that which is
unknown to me. By defining its composition,
I feel reassured in my knowledge.

Oh, dear, must you go on that way? It takes the
magic out of a meal. I wish you wouldn’t think
about your research while we’re out eating!

If you were to ask me, I’d rather not know about
what I don’t understand. It’s simpler that way.

By my calculations, the main dish should have
arrived by now. Perhaps the thermal setting is
too low to prepare the food efficiently?
You there! Let’s battle to consume time!

They brought the main course while we were
battling... The calorie content appears to be
alarmingly high.

There isn’t any point getting impatient over the
food, dear. Isn’t this the sort of situation that you
brought your Pokémon for?

Oh, what good timing! Would you join us for a
quick battle?

Don’t fret, dear. If we take in too many calories,
we can always work them off by battling!
Does this mean I’m only talented as an artist?
You’re a lucky one...
I never thought I’d lose at Father’s restaurant...
Oh... How could I lose at dear Papa’s restaurant?
Ack! I lost... Check, please!

So young, and yet so strong!
How very remarkable!
I don’t care if I lose. I’m still a happy guy.
Waaah! You’re too much!
Wow... You’re out there.
No one’s hurt?
Tough, aren’t you...?
I was with my dad, too...
That’s quite the demonstration.
Hmm... I should have expected this.
My luck’s run out...

I think I have what it takes to become a
successful model!
Hmm... I failed to foresee this outcome.

You know, I had confidence before heading
into this.
Oh snap! That’s how it is, then?
I like to study a lot. I thought I could win...
